subject: Re: TSH - Reseller
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to follow up with you regarding a potential collaboration for
the opening of my simarcing-related company by sping 2026.
Could you please inform me of the conditions under which i could resell
your products?
I look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely.

Arnaud FISCHER

Le sam. 15 nov. 2025 à 11:25, The Sim House <thesimhouse.fr@gmail.com> a
écrit :

> Hello,
> I am reaching out to you regarding the opening of my company in France
> based on the purchase and resale of parts related to the manufacture of
> driving simulators.
> Your products interest me strongly and I would like under what conditions
> it would be possible to become one of your resellers.
>
> Looking forward to hearing from you.
>
> Sincerely,
> Arnaud FISCHER
>

conversations.body_text: ​    Hi Arnaud,  Thank you for reaching out, and congratulations on your upcoming sim-racing business — that’s exciting news!  We’re open to discussing a potential reseller partnership. To move forward, could you please provide us with a rough purchasing plan, including:    Which Simsonn products you are interested in reselling    The approximate quantities you expect to order initially    Your estimated launch timeline and target market    With this information, we can prepare appropriate pricing and reseller conditions for you.  Looking forward to your reply!  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hello team !

Thank you for your return, at this stage my business plan is still evolving
and remains approximate.
I'm interested in reselling several of your products, although
the quantities for the first order are still approximate and will need to
be confirmed before the launch in spring 2026 :

The newest Plus X Pro pedals with haptic and baseplate (black and silver
set) - 5 pieces after test
The newest Pro X ULTRA P3 H3 pedals with haptic and baseplate (black and
RGB set) - for the showroom and test
The Simsonn SQ Pro Shifter and the HB Pro Handbrake - for the showroom and
test
The Simsonn Racing Simulator Handbrake  - 5 pieces after test
The Simsonn Haptic Linear Motor - 10 pieces after test

I look forward to your terms and conditions, particularly regarding the
equipment, which I would also like to test if possible before the first
true orders are placed.

Best regards.

Arnaud FISCHER



Le mer. 3 déc. 2025 à 12:05, service@simsonn.com

Hello and happy new year !

I'm waiting for your answer if you can come back to me.

Have a nice day !

Best regards.

Arnaud FISCHER

Le mer. 3 déc. 2025 à 22:20, The Sim House <thesimhouse.fr@gmail.com> a
écrit :

> Hello team !
>
> Thank you for your return, at this stage my business plan is still
> evolving and remains approximate.
> I'm interested in reselling several of your products, although
> the quantities for the first order are still approximate and will need to
> be confirmed before the launch in spring 2026 :
>
> The newest Plus X Pro pedals with haptic and baseplate (black and silver
> set) - 5 pieces after test
> The newest Pro X ULTRA P3 H3 pedals with haptic and baseplate (black and
> RGB set) - for the showroom and test
> The Simsonn SQ Pro Shifter and the HB Pro Handbrake - for the showroom and
> test
> The Simsonn Racing Simulator Handbrake  - 5 pieces after test
> The Simsonn Haptic Linear Motor - 10 pieces after test

> Le mer. 3 déc. 2025 à 12:05, service@simsonn.com
Hi The Sim House,  I have forwarded this to our sales representative, and she will contact you directly.

Thank you, looking forward to it.

Le dim. 11 janv. 2026 à 04:50, service@simsonn.com
